protocol_name: A protocol of Electroacupuncture (EA) treatment on sub-acutely aging rats
protocol_name_html: A protocol of Electroacupuncture (EA) treatment on sub-acutely aging rats
description: A protocol of Electroacupuncture (EA) treatment on sub-acutely aging rats.
before_start: Sterile acupuncture needles [size:φ0.30*25 mm (diameter:0.30 millimeter, length: 25 millimeter); made by Suzhou Acupuncture ＆ Moxibustion Appliance Co., Lid, Suzhou, P.R. China] and the pulse generator (6805-II, Shanghai Taicheng technology development co ., LTD) were used during the EA treatment.
protocol_affiliation: Acupuncture-moxibustion and Orthopedic College, Hubei University of Chinese Medicine,The Third Clinical Medicine College, Henan University of Chinese Medicine
manuscript_citation: Liu J, Liu J, Wang G, Liu G, Zhou H, Fan Y, Liang F, Wang H (2018) Electroacupuncture at Guanyuan (CV 4), Zusanli (ST 36) and Baihui (DU 20) regulate the aging-related changes in gene expression profile of the hippocampus in sub-acutely aging rats. PLoS ONE 13(1): e0191623. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0191623
authors: Jianmin Liu,Jing Liu,Guang’an Wang,Guangya Liu,Huanjiao Zhou,Yun Fan,Fengxia Liang,Hua Wang

components.data: Needles were inserted perpendicularly into the muscle layer at Guanyuan (CV 4), Zusanli (ST 36) and inserted horizontally into subgaleal tissue at the point of Baihui (DU 20) to a depth of 2 mm.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Needles were inserted perpendicularly into the muscle layer at Guanyuan (CV 4), Zusanli (ST 36) and inserted horizontally into subgaleal tissue at the point of Baihui (DU 20) to a depth of 2 mm.

components.data: The Guanyuan (CV 4) acupoint was connected to the negative charge of the pulse generator and the Zusanli (the bilateral Zusanli were used alternately in the EA treatment) was connected to the positive charge (continuous wave: 2 Hz, 1 mA, lasted 15 min).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The Guanyuan (CV 4) acupoint was connected to the negative charge of the pulse generator and the Zusanli (the bilateral Zusanli were used alternately in the EA treatment) was connected to the positive charge (continuous wave: 2 Hz, 1 mA, lasted 15 min).

components.data: Baihui (DU 20) was stimulated with needles at the same time: After the needle has reached its desired location, to twirl and rotate the needle backward and forward continuously with the frequency2-3 times per second for 30 seconds.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Baihui (DU 20) was stimulated with needles at the same time: After the needle has reached its desired location, to twirl and rotate the needle backward and forward continuously with the frequency2-3 times per second for 30 seconds.

components.data: The same manipulation was done after every 5 minutes for three times until withdrawing the needle. The EA treatment was performed every day except Sunday and lasted for 27 days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The same manipulation was done after every 5 minutes for three times until withdrawing the needle. The EA treatment was performed every day except Sunday and lasted for 27 days.
